page.title: 06CLEATOR MOOR SPORTS DAY
page.content: Every year Cleator Moor Sports Day is held at Wath Brow Hornets rugby field in July. A lot of different events take place on this day and it attracts lots of competitors from different places like Workington,Carlisle and Seaton.One attraction is The Fell Race which starts at the Sports Field, goes up Coppers Helmet to the top of Dent then back to the Sports Field,covering a distance of about five or six miles. The Cumberland wrestling is a big attraction where people from all over the county compete against each other. Cycling is very exciting to watch but is often dangerous for the cyclist and the spectators.One of the most popular events on Sports Day is Hound Trailing which takes place over Dent and is the Wath Brow trail. There are also stalls that sell refreshments and food. by Dawn Brogden
